TEXT.TITLE: CPI <CPIC> TO SELL ATT <T> COMPUTER PRODUCTS
TEXT.BODY: CPI Corp said American Telephone and Telegraph has authorized its Business Telephone Systems division to represent its computer product line to the St. Louis and Chicago business markets. CPI said the products included in the agreement are computers, printers, telephone modems and fax machines. Reuter
